data.what_is: SendCloud is a SaaS platform developed and operated by Wuhan Shanda Technology Co., Ltd. to provide customers with email and SMS sending services. Since its launch in 2013, the platform has provided tens of thousands of enterprise customers with stable, efficient and secure email and SMS sending services and accurate and timely sending data reports.
data.product_description: SendCloud is a SaaS platform developed and operated by Wuhan Shanda Technology Co., Ltd. to provide customers with email and SMS sending services. Since its launch in 2013, the platform has provided tens of thousands of enterprise customers with stable, efficient and secure email and SMS sending services and accurate and timely sending data reports.
data.seller: Wu Yi Shan Da Ke Ji You Xian Gong Si

initial_reviews.review_title: Cao Zuo Jian Dan You Yong ,Song Da Lu Gao De Fa Song SaasPing Tai
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about SendCloud?
Ju You Ke Shi Hua Zi Zhu Yan Fa Shan Shan Bian Ji Qi ,Yi Jian Tuo Zhuai Shi Zhi Zuo Mo Ban ,Yi Ji Ti Gong Jing Mei Mo Ban Shi Chang ,Jie Sheng Wo Tou Ru Zhi Zuo Mo Ban Shi Jian 

Fa Song Ji Ke Yi Feng Fu Jie Kou Dui Jie He Kai Fa ,Ye Zhi Chi Ke Shi Hua Ye Mian Cao Zuo You Jian Ren Wu Ding Shi Fa Song ,Man Zu Ge Ge Bu Men Bu Tong Shi Yong Xu Qiu 

What do you dislike about SendCloud?
Fen Guo Ji Ban He Guo Nei Ban 2Tao Xi Tong ,Qing Qiu Fu Wu Qi Bu Shu Zai Chu Zhong Guo Yi Wai De Di Qu ,Fa Song Zhong Guo Yi Wai Di Qu You Xiang Ju Duo ,Tui Jian Shi Yong Guo Ji Ban . Qing Qiu Fu Wu Qi Bu Shu Zai Zhong Guo ,Fa Song Du Shi Zhong Guo Di Qu You Xiang Ju Duo ,Tui Jian Shi Yong Guo Nei Ban . Mu Qian 2Tao Xi Tong Mei You Da Tong ,Xu Yao Dan Du Zhu Ce Shi Yong . 

What problems is SendCloud solving and how is that benefiting you?
SendCloudZai Gei Quan Qiu Qi Ye Ti Gong You Jian He Duan Xin Di San Fang Fa Song Fu Wu ,Bang Zhu Zhong Guo Qi Ye Chu Hai Ye Wu Fa Zhan ,Yi Ji Bang Zhu Quan Qiu Qi Ye Ru Zhu Zhong Guo Shi Chang ,Wei Bu Tong Qi Ye Ke Hu Ti Gong You Jie Zhi Hong Da Fu Wu .
